etymology.description: 乃(乃) (nǎi, "be") + 八(八) (bā, "divide") = serving or attending to tasks divided among people -> to serve
etymology.interpretation: The character combines 乃(乃) (nǎi, "be") suggesting the state of being with 八(八) (bā, "divide") indicating distribution or division of tasks, fittingly representing service or attendance to duties.

examples.chinese: 他服從父母(他服從父母)，努力学习(努力學習)。
examples.english: He serves his parents and studies hard.

examples.chinese: 士兵服役于军队(士兵服役於軍隊)。
